name: ROGALIK
description:
The return of the famous platformer in a new version.
Play the continuation of the project and evaluate new opportunities.
In the near future, a global expansion of the game levels

ROGALIK - This is a two-dimensional platformer, whose actions take place in Ancient Greece, stylized with pixel graphics. You have to play for a warrior that, with a sword and shield, fights against various opponents and passes numerous obstacles. You will face various difficulties and dangers and your goal is to overcome them.

Features
- Different enemies and their behavior
- Dangerous traps
- Unique 2D design
- Good soundtrack
- Enemies
